channel.title: [PI] Dung shop
channel.description:
Fixed thanks to Get Blitz.
[s]I need help changing the price of these two. They're worth 0 dung tokens, and I've looked in shops.cfg and it didn't even show the item in the store as the price 0. It was worth about 100k tokens. How can I change the price?
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/dungshop.png[/img][/s]

item.title: [PI] Dung shop
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

ShopAssistant.java Search for

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

You will see something like

case XXXX: return XXXX;

UNDER those add something like this and change the amount and id -This is for if your adding a new item

Case ITEMID:
return AMOUNT THAT IS COSTS;

Or just search for your itemid and change the return amount to how much ever you want.

Read full topic
